original_text: Korah brought all his group of people to stand against Moses and Aaron at the door of the Tent of Meeting. Then the glory of the Lord appeared to all the people.
korean_text: 고라가 온 회중을 회막 문에 모아 놓고 그 두 사람을 대적하려 하매 여호와의 영광이 온 회중에게 나타나시니라

sentences.original_text: Korah brought all his group of people
to stand against Moses and Aaron
at the door of the Tent of Meeting
Then the glory of the Lord appeared
